mapper.select: SELECT * FROM consumer WHERE email = #{email} AND delete_flag = 'N'

SELECT c.consumer_id AS consumer_id , c.name AS consumer_name , COUNT(w.wish_list_id) AS wish_count , COUNT(b.basket_id) AS basket_count FROM consumer c LEFT JOIN wish_list w ON c.consumer_id = w.consumer_id LEFT JOIN basket b ON c.consumer_id = b.consumer_id WHERE c.consumer_id = #{consumerId} GROUP BY consumer_id , consumer_name
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM consumer WHERE email = #{email})
